title: Increases penalties for aggravated unlicensed operation of motor vehicle in second and first degrees; in certain cases
summary: Increases penalties for aggravated unlicensed operation of motor vehicle in second and first degrees.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1640

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. GANTT, ORTIZ -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation  to  increasing
         the  penalties  for aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle
         in the second and first degrees in certain cases

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Paragraph (b) of subdivision 2 of section 511 of the vehi-
    2  cle and traffic law, as amended by chapter 607 of the laws of  1993,  is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    (b)  Aggravated  unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle in the second
    5  degree is a misdemeanor. When a person is convicted of this crime  under
    6  subparagraph  (i)  of paragraph (a) of this subdivision, the sentence of
    7  the court must be: (i) a fine of not less than five hundred dollars; and
    8  (ii) a term of imprisonment not to exceed one hundred  eighty  days;  or
    9  (iii)  where appropriate a sentence of probation as provided in subdivi-
   10  sion six of this section; or (iv) a term of imprisonment as a  condition
   11  of  a  sentence of probation as provided in the penal law and consistent
   12  with this section. When a  person  is  convicted  of  this  crime  under
   13  subparagraph  (ii),  (iii) or (iv) of paragraph (a) of this subdivision,
   14  the sentence of the court must be: (i) a fine of  not  less  than  [five
   15  hundred] SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY dollars nor more than one thousand dollars;
   16  and  (ii)  a  term  of imprisonment of not less than seven days nor more
   17  than one [hundred eighty  days]  YEAR,  or  (iii)  where  appropriate  a
   18  sentence of probation as provided in subdivision six of this section; or
   19  (iv) a term of imprisonment as a condition of a sentence of probation as
   20  provided in the penal law and consistent with this section.
   21    S  2. Paragraph (b) of subdivision 3 of section 511 of the vehicle and
   22  traffic law, as separately amended by chapters 786 and 892 of  the  laws
   23  of 1990, is amended to read as follows:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03225-01-1

       A. 1640                             2

    1    (b)  Aggravated  unlicensed  operation of a motor vehicle in the first
    2  degree is a class E felony. When a person is convicted  of  this  crime,
    3  the sentence of the court must be: (i) a fine in an amount not less than
    4  [five]  TWENTY-FIVE hundred dollars nor more than five thousand dollars;
    5  and  (ii)  a term of imprisonment as provided in the penal law, or (iii)
    6  where appropriate and a term of imprisonment  is  not  required  by  the
    7  penal  law,  a  sentence  of probation as provided in subdivision six of
    8  this section, or (iv) a  term  of  imprisonment  as  a  condition  of  a
    9  sentence of probation as provided in the penal law.
   10    S 3. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   11  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.
